short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides opinions, reviews, and sponsored content on stuff.co.nz.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on simply hides articles on Stuff.co.nz's homepage that are deemed to be opinions, reviews, or sponsored content. By default, these articles are grayed out but can be seen by hovering the mouse over them.
